title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\RecurringSchedule
name: RecurringSchedule
description:
Sets the time for recurring patch deployments.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.RecurringSchedule

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.time_zone
params.description: Required. Defines the time zone that time_of_day is relative to. The rules for daylight saving time are determined by the chosen time zone.

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: Optional. The time that the recurring schedule becomes effective. Defaults to create_time of the patch deployment.

params.name: data.end_time
params.description: Optional. The end time at which a recurring patch deployment schedule is no longer active.

params.name: data.time_of_day
params.description: Required. Time of the day to run a recurring deployment.

params.name: data.frequency
params.description: Required. The frequency unit of this recurring schedule.

params.name: data.last_execute_time
params.description: Output only. The time the last patch job ran successfully.

params.name: data.next_execute_time
params.description: Output only. The time the next patch job is scheduled to run.
